data.actual_result: The bots name is slightly above the tag, or rather, the tag is slightly below the bots name.
data.expected_result: The bot tag and the bots name are aligned fine, no issues.
data.short_description: BOT tag uncentered on compact mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Compact Mode Enabled  - Have a bot send a message (in this example, plain text)
